extendedInfo.description: What Size Pro is an ad-free version of What Size which is a free app that will keep track of clothes sizes for the people closest to you.Add a person, choose his/her gender, and describe his/her taste in clothes.Based on the gender you choose, certain articles of clothing will appear.Enter clothes sizes for the people in your list.Only in What Size Pro - Email sizes of people in your list.Backup your data to an SD card and restore it.  If you have at least Android 2.2, this application utilizes a backup service that will automatically backup your data for you to the cloud. When you reinstall this app, your data will be restored.
